programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: Linda brings home her younger boyfriend Evan for the holidays, to her family and ex-husband Robert's surprise; Robert and Evan may have more in common than not.

programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: Gaby's family traditions are thwarted by Katie, her former high school bully and her brother's current girlfriend.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: At their obligatory pre-Christmas lunch, estranged identical twins decide to swap lives up until Christmas Day.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche fails to seduce her date and is heartbroken; Dorothy goes bananas over a "Beatlemania" cast member.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy dreams she is a contestant on "Jeopardy!" but the game is fixed in favor of neighbor Charlie Dietz.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and Stan are ordered by a judge to inhabit one of their substandard apartments.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Although she wrecks three big dates for him, Frasier considers trying to reconcile Sherry with Martin.

programme.desc: Although she wrecks three big dates for him, Frasier considers trying to reconcile Sherry with Martin.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Everyone panics when Kyra disappears in the middle of the night; Van and Cheyenne appear on a cable sports show.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbara Jean arranges a blind date for reluctant Reba; Van uses his bonus to buy a new sports car without consulting Cheyenne.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Trying to be more wild, Reba takes Van's new sports car for a joy ride and accidntally ends up scratching it.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean comes to Reba for advice when she suspects that Brock is cheating on her; Kyra's boyfriend breaks her heart.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: An ambitious married woman gets more than she bargained for when her wish to be single again is granted. She awakens to discover she's got everything she's ever wanted, except her husband. She resolves to find him a second time.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: A series of mishaps disturbs the plans of a recently divorced mom (Anne Heche) for her two kids on their first Christmas without dad.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: Lila is hired by the royal family of Ancadia to repair a carousel and must work with the prince to complete it by Christmas.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur is trying to win over investors for the dating app she has developed. To help bring on investors for expansion, she promises to take part in using it in the coming weeks before Christmas to find love and track her progress.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: Next Stop, Christmas
programme.desc: Angie wonders what life would be like if she had married an ex who became famous. When she finds herself magically transported into the past, Angie has the chance to relive that Christmas and learn what (and who) is truly important to her.

programme.title: Christmas at Sea
programme.desc: The holiday cruise is packed with excitement!; Rob has an unforgettable surprise for Donna, Gail and Alicia enjoy an off-road adventure with a very special guest, and the Mr. Shipmas Contest sparks some friendly competition.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: The Santa Class
programme.desc: Kate North, the owner of a struggling Santa School, and her instructor, Dan, must help an amnesia-stricken Santa Claus regain his memories to save Christmas and hopefully her school as well.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy replaces Blanche as the center of attention for the men at Blanche's favorite nightspot.
